info.title: Microsoft Bookings MCP
info.description: MCP-enabled connector for Microsoft Bookings (Microsoft Graph). Implements tools for managing booking businesses, services, staff members, customers, and appointments.

post.description: Sends JSON-RPC requests to invoke Microsoft Bookings (Microsoft Graph) tools via MCP.

get.description: Get a collection of bookingBusiness objects that has been created for the tenant.

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Number of items to return

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Number of items to skip

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: OData filter expression

get.description: Get a specific booking currency by ID.

parameters.name: currencyId
parameters.description: The currency ID (e.g., USD, EUR)

dateTimeTimeZone.description: Describes the date, time, and time zone of a point in time.

dateTime.description: A single point of time in a combined date and time representation ({date}T{time}; for example, 2017-08-29T04:00:00.0000000).

timeZone.description: Represents a time zone, for example, 'Pacific Standard Time'.

physicalAddress.description: Represents the street address of a resource such as a contact or event.

countryOrRegion.description: The country or region. It's a free-format string value, for example, 'United States'.

outlookGeoCoordinates.description: The geographic coordinates, elevation, and their degree of accuracy for a physical location.

accuracy.description: The accuracy of the latitude and longitude. As an example, the accuracy can be measured in meters, such as the latitude and longitude are accurate to within 50 meters.

location.description: Represents location information for an event.

displayName.description: The name associated with the location.

locationEmailAddress.description: Optional email address of the location.

bookingWorkTimeSlot.description: Defines the start and end times for work.

start.description: The time of the day when work starts. For example, 08:00:00.0000000.

end.description: The time of the day when work stops. For example, 17:00:00.0000000.

bookingWorkHours.description: Represents the set of working hours in a single day of the week.

timeSlots.description: A list of start/end times during a day.

bookingReminder.description: Represents when and to whom to send an e-mail reminder.

offset.description: The amount of time before the start of an appointment that the reminder should be sent. It's denoted in ISO 8601 format.

bookingReminderRecipients.description: Specifies who should receive the reminder.

bookingSchedulingPolicy.description: Represents the set of policies that determine how appointments can be created in a Booking Calendar.

allowStaffSelection.description: True if to allow customers to choose a specific person for the booking.

customAvailabilities.description: Custom availability of the service in a given time frame.

isMeetingInviteToCustomersEnabled.description: Indicates whether to send meeting invites to customers.

maximumAdvance.description: Maximum number of days in advance that a booking can be made. It follows the ISO 8601 format.

minimumLeadTime.description: The minimum amount of time before which bookings and cancellations must be made. It follows the ISO 8601 format.

sendConfirmationsToOwner.description: True to notify the business via email when a booking is created or changed.

timeSlotInterval.description: Duration of each time slot, denoted in ISO 8601 format.

bookingsAvailability.description: Represents the availability of a booking service.

businessHours.description: The hours of operation in a week.

bookingsAvailabilityWindow.description: Represents the availability of a booking service in a scheduling policy between two dates.

businessHours.description: The hours of operation in a week.

endDate.description: End date of the availability window.

startDate.description: Start date of the availability window.

bookingsServiceAvailabilityType.description: The availability type of the booking service.

bookingPriceType.description: Represents the type of pricing of a booking service.

bookingCustomQuestion.description: Represents a custom question of the business.

id.description: The ID of the custom question.

displayName.description: The display name of the custom question.

bookingQuestionAssignment.description: Contains the set of custom questions associated with a particular service.

isRequired.description: Indicates whether it's mandatory to answer the custom question.

questionId.description: The ID of the custom question.

availabilityItem.description: Indicates the status of a staff member for a given time slot.

serviceId.description: Indicates the service ID for 1:n appointments. If the appointment is of type 1:n, this field is present, otherwise, null.

bookingsAvailabilityStatus.description: The availability status of a staff member.

bookingCustomerInformationBase.description: Base type for customer information in a booking.

@odata.type.description: The OData type of the customer information.

bookingCustomerInformation.description: Represents customer information for a booking.

customerId.description: The ID of the bookingCustomer for this appointment.

emailAddress.description: The SMTP address of the customer.

bookingQuestionAnswer.description: Contains a custom question, the answer given by the customer, and other properties.

answer.description: The answer given by the customer.

questionId.description: The ID of the custom question.

bookingStaffRole.description: The role of a staff member.

bookingStaffMembershipStatus.description: The membership status of a staff member.

bookingAppointment.description: Represents a booked appointment of a service by a customer in a business.

id.description: The unique identifier for the booking appointment.

additionalInformation.description: Additional information sent to the customer when an appointment is confirmed.

anonymousJoinWebUrl.description: The URL of the meeting to join anonymously.

appointmentLabel.description: The custom label that can be stamped on this appointment by users.

createdDateTime.description: The date, time, and time zone when the appointment was created.

customerEmailAddress.description: The SMTP address of the bookingCustomer who books the appointment.

customerNotes.description: Notes from the customer associated with this appointment.

customerTimeZone.description: The time zone of the customer.

customers.description: A collection of customer properties for an appointment.

isCustomerAllowedToManageBooking.description: Indicates that the customer can manage bookings created by the staff.

isLocationOnline.description: Indicates that the appointment is held online.

joinWebUrl.description: The URL of the online meeting for the appointment.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The date, time, and time zone when the booking business was last updated.

maximumAttendeesCount.description: The maximum number of customers allowed in an appointment.

optOutOfCustomerEmail.description: True indicates that the bookingCustomer for this appointment doesn't wish to receive a confirmation.

postBuffer.description: The amount of time to reserve after the appointment ends. ISO8601 format.

preBuffer.description: The amount of time to reserve before the appointment begins. ISO8601 format.

price.description: The regular price for an appointment for the specified bookingService.

reminders.description: The collection of customer reminders sent for this appointment.

selfServiceAppointmentId.description: Another tracking ID for the appointment, if created by the customer on the scheduling page.

serviceId.description: The ID of the bookingService associated with this appointment.

serviceName.description: The name of the bookingService associated with this appointment.

smsNotificationsEnabled.description: True indicates SMS notifications will be sent to the customers for the appointment.

staffMemberIds.description: The ID of each bookingStaffMember who is scheduled in this appointment.

id.description: The unique identifier for the bookingBusiness.

businessHours.description: The hours of operation for the business.

defaultCurrencyIso.description: The code for the currency that the business operates in on Microsoft Bookings.

email.description: The email address for the business.

isPublished.description: The scheduling page has been made available to external customers.

languageTag.description: The language of the self-service booking page.

phone.description: The telephone number for the business.

publicUrl.description: The URL for the scheduling page.

webSiteUrl.description: The URL of the business web site.

bookingService.description: Represents a particular service offered by a booking business.

id.description: The unique identifier for the bookingService.

additionalInformation.description: Additional information that is sent to the customer when an appointment is confirmed.

customQuestions.description: Contains the set of custom questions associated with a particular service.

defaultDuration.description: The default length of the service, represented in numbers of days, hours, minutes, and seconds. ISO8601 format.

defaultPrice.description: The default monetary price for the service.

defaultReminders.description: The default set of reminders for an appointment of this service.

description.description: A text description for the service.

isAnonymousJoinEnabled.description: True if the URL to join the appointment anonymously is generated for the appointment booked for this service.

isCustomerAllowedToManageBooking.description: Indicates that the customer can manage bookings created by the staff.

isHiddenFromCustomers.description: True means this service is not available to customers for booking.

isLocationOnline.description: True indicates that the appointments for the service will be held online.

languageTag.description: The language of the self-service booking page.

maximumAttendeesCount.description: The maximum number of customers allowed in a service.

postBuffer.description: The time to buffer after an appointment for this service ends. ISO8601 format.

preBuffer.description: The time to buffer before an appointment for this service can start. ISO8601 format.

smsNotificationsEnabled.description: True indicates SMS notifications can be sent to the customers for the appointment.

staffMemberIds.description: Represents those staff members who provide this service.

webUrl.description: The URL a customer uses to access the service.

bookingStaffMember.description: Represents a staff member who provides services in a business.

id.description: The unique identifier for the bookingStaffMember.

availabilityIsAffectedByPersonalCalendar.description: True means that if the staff member is a Microsoft 365 user, the Bookings API would verify the staff member's availability in their personal calendar.

colorIndex.description: Identifies a color to represent the staff member.

createdDateTime.description: The date and time when the staff member was created.

displayName.description: The name of the staff member.

emailAddress.description: The email address of the staff member.

isEmailNotificationEnabled.description: True indicates that a staff member will be notified via email when a booking assigned to them is created or changed.

timeZone.description: The time zone of the staff member.

useBusinessHours.description: True means the staff member's availability is as specified in the businessHours property of the business.

workingHours.description: The range of hours each day of the week that the staff member is available for booking.

bookingCustomer.description: Represents a customer of a bookingBusiness.

id.description: The unique identifier for the bookingCustomer.

createdDateTime.description: The date and time when the customer was created.

emailAddress.description: The SMTP address of the customer.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The date and time when the customer was last updated.

phones.description: Phone numbers associated with the customer.

bookingCurrency.description: Represents a currency supported by a bookingBusiness.

id.description: The currency code. For example, USD for US dollar.

symbol.description: The currency symbol. For example, $ for US dollar.

staffAvailabilityItem.description: Represents the availability of a staff member for a given time slot.

availabilityItems.description: Each item in this collection indicates a slot and the status of the staff member.

staffId.description: The ID of the staff member.

timeSlot.description: Represents a time slot for a meeting.

bookingPageSettings.description: Represents the settings of a published booking page.

bookingPageColorCode.description: Custom color for the booking page. The value should be in Hex format. For example, #123456.

businessTimeZone.description: The time zone of the customer.

customerConsentMessage.description: The personal data collection and usage consent message in the booking page.

enforceOneTimePassword.description: Determines whether the one-time password is required to create an appointment. The default value is false.

isBusinessLogoDisplayEnabled.description: Indicates whether the business logo is displayed on the booking page. The default value is false.

isCustomerConsentEnabled.description: Enables personal data collection and the usage consent toggle on the booking page. The default value is false.

isSearchEngineIndexabilityDisabled.description: Indicates whether web crawlers index this page. The defaults value is false.

isTimeSlotTimeZoneSetToBusinessTimeZone.description: Indicates whether the time zone of the time slot is set to the time zone of the business. The default value is false.

privacyPolicyWebUrl.description: URL of a webpage that provides the privacy policy of the business.

termsAndConditionsWebUrl.description: URL of a webpage that provides the terms and conditions of the business.

bookingPageAccessControl.description: Access control on a published booking page.
